model.hed: Celebrities tell *AD* what’s on their cocktail tables
model.dek: Jessica Chastain, Zosia Mamet, Oscar Isaac, Trudie Styler, and Zachary Quinto Reveal what’s on their cocktail tables

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-01-trudie-styler-sting.jpg
items.caption: Attending the premiere of *Into the Woods,* which features the work of her friends costume designer Colleen Atwood and actress Meryl Streep, __Trudie Styler__ mentioned a truly chic arrangement. “An Yves Klein book on an Yves Klein table,” Styler replied as her husband, Sting, attempted to drag her into the theater. “And we have a meteorite on our table. It’s the size of a cowpat, and it’s *really* heavy. It was found in Argentina in 1947 and given to us.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-02-zosia-mamet.jpg
items.caption: At the Armani-sponsored debut of *A Most Violent Year, Girls* star __Zosia Mamet__ told *AD,* “A few books, including *The Half: Photographs of Actors Preparing for the Stage.* It is British photographer Simon Annand’s shots of actors at their half-hour call, and it’s one of my favorite books of all time. I also have ashtrays from various places that have sandalwood and sage in them, and then there are matches and a laptop.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-03-oscar-isaac.jpg
items.caption: “Sawdust,” said __Oscar Isaac,__ the star of *A Most Violent Year.* “I’m working on my place right now. It’s an apartment that I’ve had for a while, and I’m knocking down some walls and getting light in there.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-04-jessica-chastain.jpg
items.caption: Isaac’s *A Most Violent Year* costar __Jessica Chastain__ mentioned a book related to her role in *Interstellar.* “Ooh, I have a great book [on my cocktail table]. It’s about the cosmos,” she said. “[Director] Christopher Nolan gave it to me. The table is from Restoration Hardware, and it’s made from reclaimed wood.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-05-lindsay-ellingson.jpg
items.caption: Supermodel __Lindsay Ellingson,__ who got married in July, told us at the premiere of *A Most Violent Year* that her cocktail table is covered with “a ton of glitter that’s never come off. I did all my wedding projects on it and I was adding glitter to everything. It still brings back memories of the wedding. The table is from Century, and I usually have a beautiful vase in the center with flowers.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-06-zachary-quinto.jpg
items.caption: “I’m in the middle of moving,” explained __Zachary Quinto,__ whose company produced *A Most Violent Year*. “Probably takeout food. But whatever is on my table today won’t be by tomorrow.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-07-drew-nieporent.jpg
items.caption: Catching the Cinema Society debut of James Franco’s film *The Color of Time,* restaurateur __Drew Nieporent__ noted that architect David Rockwell’s upcoming book *What If...?,* which includes his restaurant Nobu, is prominently placed on his cocktail table. “The binding is unique,” Nieporent said. “And it shows all of his projects over the last several years. The table itself is low, with a glass inlay, where we placed pictures of my wife’s grandparents.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-08-rhea-durham.jpg
items.caption: During the premiere of *The Gambler,* model __Rhea Durham__ told *AD* that she and her husband, Mark Wahlberg, “just built a house in L.A., so we have many [cocktail] tables. In the family room, we have a lot of photo albums of the children, coasters, and that’s about it,” she said. “But in the great room, the table has vases and formal family photos—our past Christmas cards and pictures of Mark and me out together at, say, the Oscars.”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-09-dr-oz.jpg
items.caption: __Dr. Mehmet Oz__ and his wife, Lisa, paused to chat on their way into the Z100 Jingle Ball. “There is a big orchid display and a couple of decorative books,” said Lisa. “And I have a Turkish scimitar—a curved, bejeweled knife—that I’ve had for a long time,” Dr. Oz added. “My father bought it for me in the old section of the Grand Bazaar in Istanbul when I was a little kid. ”

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-10-common.jpg
items.caption: The rapper __Common,__ who stars in *Selma,* a powerful film about the pivotal civil rights marches that took place in Selma, Alabama, in 1965, noted that he has several books on his cocktail table. “One is about Afros,” he said.

items.title: dam-images-daily-2014-12-tig-cocktail-tables-tig-celebrity-cocktail-tables-11-tyler-perry.jpg
items.caption: At the Ziegfeld Theatre to see *Selma,* actor, director, and screenwriter __Tyler Perry__ offered an answer we loved. “There are a few books about home design and home building,” he said. “And *Architectural Digest.*”
